1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Token pattern.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Pattern
7  ( -- * Text token
8    pattern TTextUnk,
9    pattern TTextRaw,
10    pattern TTextQ,
11    pattern TTextQQ,
12    pattern TTextKey,
13    pattern TTextBar,
14    pattern TTextLicense,
15    pattern TTextSect,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token  as S
19
20
21-- ----------------------  Text token
22
23-- | Unknown text token.
24pattern TTextUnk cp w = S.TText cp S.TextUnk  w
25
26-- | Raw text token.
27--
28--   >>> S.TTextRaw B.def "a"   -- a
29pattern TTextRaw cp w = S.TText cp S.TextRaw  w
30
31-- | Quoted text token.
32--
33--   >>> S.TTextQ B.def "a"   -- 'a
34pattern TTextQ cp w = S.TText cp S.TextQ    w
35
36-- | Dobule-quoted text token.
37--
38--   >>> S.TTextQQ B.def "a"   -- "a"
39pattern TTextQQ cp w = S.TText cp S.TextQQ   w
40
41-- | Keyword token.
42--
43--   >>> S.TTextKey B.def "a"   -- <a>
44pattern TTextKey cp w = S.TText cp S.TextKey  w
45
46-- | Bar-enclosed token.
47--
48--   >>> S.TTextBar B.def "a"   -- |a|
49pattern TTextBar cp w = S.TText cp S.TextBar  w
50
51-- | License text token.
52pattern TTextLicense cp w = S.TText cp S.TextLicense w
53
54-- | Section sign.
55pattern TTextSect cp = TTextRaw cp "==="
56
